caption.p: ToF-SIMS elemental depth profiles of Ti 75Ni 15Cu 10 ( a) as-deposited (using a as the index) and after heat treatment at 373 K for 110 h (using b as the index) and Ti 10Ni 50Cu 40 ( b) as-deposited and after heat treatment at 373 K for 110 h (different colour of the background represents different element layers).
